attributes.background: There are so many children that get bullied and it's not always noticed and some children are to scared to speak out and some children feel totally alone

rejection.details:
Schools are responsible for their anti-bullying policies: https://www.gov.uk/bullying-at-school/the-law

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
